title: p adic analysis - Composition in function fields
body: Let $k=\mathbb F_q\left(\!\left(\frac1T\right)\!\right)$ . One has the map: $\circ:k\times\{v\in k\mid\deg(v)>0\}\to k$ defined by $f\circ g=\sum_{n\ge-m}a_ng^{-n}$ where $f=\sum_{n\ge-m}a_n\frac1{T^n}$ ( $m\in\mathbb N_0$ , $a_n\in\mathbb F_q$ ). Denote by $\Omega$ a completion of $\overline k$ for the valuation $-\deg$ . Can one extend $\circ$ continuously to $\Omega\times \{v\in\Omega\mid\deg(v)>0\}$ ? fields p-adic-analysis p-adic-numbers p-adic Share Cite Improve this question Follow edited Aug 1, 2020 at 7:16 YCor 67.5k 5 5 gold badges 203 203 silver badges 301 301 bronze badges asked Aug 1, 2020 at 4:09 joaopa 4,358 1 1 gold badge 17 17 silver badges 24 24 bronze badges $\endgroup$ Add a comment  |  0 Sorted by: Reset to default Highest score (default) Date modified (newest first) Date created (oldest first) You must log in to answer this question.
